MAIN_MESSAGE: Further to a power cut on Sunday 25th April in the L16 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Court Hey, in order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power from 3:00pm and we expect the power to be restored by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:45pm on 26th April 2021.
